body.text:
{% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Batutuwan da aka zaba: Dattin Hakora 
Zaɓi tambayoyin cikin jerin da ke ƙasa, don samun shawarwarin kula da baki

 1. Me ke sa hakora tabo
 2. Dalilin koffe
 3. Shan taba/Miraa
 4. Dabare dabare mai launin kasa{%else%}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Selected Topic: Stained teeth

 Choose an option

 1. Why yellow teeth
 2. Yellowness of medicine
 3. Yellowness lower teeth
 4. Yellow spots {%endif%}

rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Hakora rawaya duk da tsaftacewa na yau da kullum{%else%}I brush my teeth daily but my teeth still have stains{%endif%}
